attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
(including Racism, Sexism, Ageism, Religious intolerance, Xenophobia, Speciesism and other forms of discrimation).

I believe in equal rights and would like to put an end to Racism, Sexism, Ageism, Religious intolerance, Xenophobia, Speciesism and other forms of discrimation. I can't do this alone, I need your help!
By educating the pubilic against dicrimination we can hopefully put a stop to discrimination in the furture.
